pullRequest.title: Remove unused project fields
pullRequest.bodyText:
The project properties useDmsImport and dmsImportCreateProcessFolder should always be true. Removes the fields from the database, removes all corresponding if’s and a lot of dead code.
Depends on prerequisite branch PR: #3344

commit.message: Better report reasons if the export fails
Remove useDmsImport and dmsImportCreateProcessFolder from project
Simplify method to create export directory

nodes.bodyText: Why do you not create a new exception class as this class has nothing to do with Kitodo.Production export.

commit.message: Implement its own class of exception

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+/*

+ * GPL3-License.txt file that was distributed with this source code.
+ */
+
+package org.kitodo.exceptions;
+
+/**
+ * An exception thrown to indicate that an attempt to export a process failed.
+ */
+public class ExportException extends RuntimeException {
+
+    /**
+     * Constructs an {@code ExportException} with the specified detail message.
+     *
+     * @param s the detail message
+     */
+    public ExportException(String s) {
+        super(s);
+    }

nodes.bodyText: if it is unused, remove it
